entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
